coreQueryPageProvider.name: SAVED_DAM_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'DamSearch' AND dc:creator = ? AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: SHARED_DAM_SEARCHES
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:mixinType = 'DamSearch' AND dc:creator != ? AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'

genericPageProvider.name: damImportFolders
genericPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:fulltext.dc:title LIKE '?' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:mixinType = 'Folderish' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted'
